If a drone is sentient then its legal, yeah. But probably every rule will
be reconsidered by the new council, so its a good think all the
suggestions are coming in, as well as all the polls (as annoying as they
are, they serve a purpouse).



On Mon, 30 Apr 2001, Soulstice Omega wrote:

> OOC: Hey, what do you RPGers think about being able to use a drone for
> storyline purposes? If you made it your character and posted for it as an
> individual as you would any other bot, could a drone be one of your
> characters?...
